entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
